items.description: This field list of objects. Each object is either a body or a model. Models can be loaded from *.csv in specific format or generated based on some function.

output_file.description: Path to file where output model would be saved.
output_file.title: output_file

overwrite.description: Flag that shows whether to overwrite model if it already exists on given filepath.
overwrite.title: overwrite

args.description: Arguments that would be passed to to constructor of a given model.
args.title: args

downsample_to.description: Target length of downsampling. If one does not need all the particles from the model, they may decrease it to this number and increase the mass correspondingly.
downsample_to.title: downsample_to

position.description: Initial offset of the whole model. If there is more than one particle, it would be applied to each particle.
position.title: position

type.description:
Type of object to be created. Can either be 'csv', 'body' or 'plummer_sphere'.

        csv - model listed in *.csv file with following format: 'x,y,z,vx,vy,vz,m'.
        body - actual particles described by its mass.
        plummer_sphere - model with given number of particles and mass described
        by the Plummer model.
type.title: type

velocity.description: Initial velocity of the whole model. If there is more than one particle, it would be applied to each particle.
velocity.title: velocity

description: Schema for creation configuration file for OMTool.
title: Creation config schema
